transcript.content: May I have your attention please?
retire from the chamber as the House prepares to return from recess.
>> The House will remain in recess until 3:45. >> We push that button
and that turns your microphone on, and the Speaker, who presides up there,
sees on his screen that I wanna talk. There's an indication that pops up, and
generally, but not always, he'll call on us in the order that we pushed our
